Parameters: error code for the failure, for use with @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesUtil#showErrorDialogFragment_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesUtil#showErrorNotification_E@
if non-null, an intent that can be used to install or update Google Play Services such that the provider can be installed
onProviderInstallFailed(int, android.con.Description: Called when installing the provider fails. This method is always called on the UI thread. Implementers may use errorCode with the standard UI elements provided by @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesUtil_E@; or recoveryIntent to implement custom UI.
onProviderInstallFailed(int, android.con.FullName: public abstract void onProviderInstallFailed (int errorCode, Intent recoveryIntent)

onProviderInstalled().Description: Called when installing the provider succeeds. This method is always called on the UI thread.

ClassDesc: Callback for notification of the result of provider installation.
